# lockAccounts

**Type Property**

A description of the setting that controls whether a user can modify their account information.

## Declaration

```swift
static let lockAccounts: SettingMetadata<Bool>
```

## Constraining Accounts

- **lockAccounts**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to prevent the user from changing their account information.
